overview: Jagoda and Zuzia are just entering puberty. Biology, hormones, pimples, first rebellion, first love. The first period. Adults can't always give support or answers. And the girls see more and more. School absurdities, unwanted rules, dilemmas to be solved. Jagoda and Zuzia are great commentators: perverse, ironic, independent, scared. They introduce us to the “girlish”’ world that every woman remembers.
title: Girls' Stories
